description:
A strange girl, Atsuko Higuchi, shows up at Ryunosuke`s house and tells him to call her "Nuku Nuku." Her tragic past has left her with amnesia... but more importantly, he`s head over heels for her! Meanwhile, Ryunosuke`s mother Akiko is tasked by Mishima to retrieve their missing Androbot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Happiness Comes with the Spring Breeze
Shiawase wa Shunpuu to Totomo ni
